activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.camera.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Enables user to choose flashlight mode (Off, Auto, On, Always On).
Sets flash mode to OFF.
Sets flash mode to AUTO.
Sets flash mode to ON.
Sets flash mode to ALWAYS ON (torch mode).
Main constraint layout holding all UI components including camera preview and overlays.
Shows live camera preview feed.
Displays shutter animation when a photo is taken.
Contains top action buttons like timer, flash, resolution, and settings.
Shows countdown timer during scheduled photo capture.
Switches between Photo and Video capture modes.
Shows elapsed recording time while video is being captured.
Switches between front and rear cameras.
Triggers photo capture or starts/stops video recording depending on current mode.
Opens last captured photo or video in a preview or external viewer.
Toggles timer options UI to allow setting countdown before photo capture.
Toggles flashlight options UI to change flash mode.
Opens resolution selection toggle group to switch between image/video resolutions.
Navigates to SettingsActivity to adjust app preferences.
Disables the timer for photo capture.
Sets 3-second delay before photo capture.
Sets 5-second delay before photo capture.
Sets 10-second delay before photo capture.

activities.summary: MainActivity is the core interface of a camera application that handles camera preview, photo/video capture, UI transitions, and interactions for modes like flash, timer, resolution selection, and settings. It supports immersive mode, device orientation handling, gesture navigation between modes, media saving, and third-party intent handling.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.camera.activities.SettingsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: displays the overflow menu with options such as 'About' and 'More apps from us'.
launches an intent related to purchasing a thank-you version of the app if visible.
toggles checkbox state and updates configuration to use English as the display language.
triggers an intent to change the application's language based on system locale.
toggles shutter sound on or off and updates the configuration accordingly.
enables/disables using volume buttons as a camera shutter and updates configuration.
toggles whether metadata is saved with photos and updates configuration.
toggles whether location information is saved with photos and videos and updates configuration.
toggles flipping front camera photos horizontally and updates configuration.
allows the user to select a new folder for saving photos and videos if purchased; otherwise shows a locked dialog.
opens a dialog to select photo compression quality and updates configuration accordingly.
opens a dialog to choose a capture mode and updates displayed value and configuration.

activities.summary: The SettingsActivity provides a user interface for configuring various application settings related to camera behavior, photo saving options, language preferences, UI customization, and additional features.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.camera.activities.SimpleActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used to handle the main functionalities of the camera application, such as capturing photos and videos, managing settings, and interacting with the user interface.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.camera.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The SplashActivity is typically used as a starting screen for the application, possibly to load initial configurations or display a splash screen before navigating to the main functionality of the app.
